meanings.definition: The degree of similarity between alleles at a particular genetic locus.
meanings.sent1: The zygosities of the alleles determined the genetic traits of the offspring.
meanings.sent2: Geneticists analyzed the zygosities to understand the inheritance patterns.
meanings.sent3: The zygosities of the genes were like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
